articles.title: Earth to Have Very Close Encounter with Small Asteroid this Week - India.com
articles.description: The asteroid, called Asteroid 2023, is expected to fly over South America. During its flight, the asteroid is predicted to be only 2,200 miles above Earth's surface, making it the closest in recorded history, according to NASA.

articles.title: Russian scientists publish image of asteroid, expected to fly above South America soon - AzerNews.Az
articles.description: Russia’s Keldysh Institute of Applied Mathematics has published a photograph of an asteroid, named 2023 BU, projected to fly just 3,600 km above South America in the early hours of Friday.
